name: Instant Pot® Sauerkraut
author: Sally Schuyler Wieringa
summary: Put your Power Pressure Cooker XL™ or Instant Pot® to work and make an awesome kraut in no time! You can eat it hot, can it, or just put in canning jars with plastic lids and place in refrigerator. Who said you had to wait weeks for it in a crock?
directions: Place cabbage in the pot of a multi-functional electric pressure cooker
Lock the lid, close the vent, and select Chicken/Meat setting according to manufacturer's instructions
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
